member.name: IAppxBlockMapFilesEnumerator.GetCurrent
member.summary: Gets the file at the current position of the enumerator.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The enumerator has passed the last item in the collection.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFilesEnumerator.GetHasCurrent
member.summary: Determines whether there is a file at the current position of the enumerator.
member.param: TRUE if the enumerator's current position references an item; FALSE if the enumerator has passed the last item in the collection.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFilesEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the position of the enumerator to the next file.

param.name: hasCurrent
param.para: TRUE if the enumerator successfully advances
FALSE if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

Note that when the enumerator passes the end of the collection for the first time, hasNext = FALSE, but the method succeeds and returns S_OK. However, the method returns E_BOUNDS if you subsequently call another MoveNext after you have already passed the end of the collection, and you have previously received hasNext = FALSE.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFilesEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates the files from a block map.
